Name: Alexander Abakumov
AboutMe:
Hello!

I've been a professional Software Engineer since 2005.

At the beginning of my career, I used mainly C\C++, and also a little PHP and Java.
In 2008 I started working on .NET and since then it became my passion :)

Since 2010 I've been working with a German outsourcing company.

I have extended experience in developing software solutions for US and German customers, such as:

  • http://futuresonline.com
  • http://www.gdv-dl.de

I'm experienced with full modern .NET web stack, WCF, SQL Server, as well as developing mobile Android apps using both Java and NDK.

I'm profficient with C#.NET, Java, C\C++, JavaScript, SQL languages.

Except coding, I like English and English-speaking countries culture, science, reading, psychology, jogging.

I'm looking for job opportunities and relocation to the US, UK, Canada, Australia or New Zealand as a full web stack\Android Software Engineer. For details, please visit this page

Thanks for reading! Hope you have a nice day!
